title: Pyke - Ult Kills by him grant 300G for TWO Damage Dealers

embed.description: Uploaded by League of Legends - Top Secret Channel on 2018-05-10.

body:
I would like to discuss this matter: Is this a support? Really? And on teamfight every kill he takes with ult counts twice as much gold? Also reset? Very interesting mechanic. Sounds totally balanced too.

What is your thoughts, everyone?

replies.body: Basicly if he gets the kill with ult - which is not hard with ignite and an agressive adc - it will grant gold for TWO damage dealers. Is this the way of "support" now? I'm not surprised you are still looking for a new name for the support role.
it's just a new kind of support, something legue hasn't seen before. I for one, welcome the change, the support role was getting rather stale.
A support that kills shit? Something new? {{champion:63}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} . Yes they aren't real supports but neither is Pyke tbh.
A support is whatever can make itself useful at a gold deficit. It has nothing to do with any design philosophy past that.

A support has to be able to support the team in some way, an execution mechanic can do that on a comp that has troubles finishing off kills, and then the rest of his kit is passive allows for trading or comboing with his stealth after going in, Q either a powerful aoe slow or weakened blitz hook, and E is an aoe stun - everything supports his team in some way, but his kit is built for the aggressive side to get kills, but he can still E in to stun then land the hook to peel a threat away that way, and then return back to his team with his W.

He is a significantly better version of Leona.

Before this gets out of hand, Pyke himself does not gain an additional 300G if he gets the kill with his Ultimate.

If there is an ally that would have gotten an assist when Pyke deals the finishing blow with his ultimate -- it instead gives it to the Ally that assisted. It also gives that ally the Killing Blow gold. Pyke gets the normal Assist gold.
"When a champion dies in the X, the last ally to assist ***also*** gains full kill gold and kill credit, and Pyke can instantly use Death from Below again for a short period of time."

I'm just saying, I don't think that's how Riot intended the ability to work.

Yes, the wording made it sound like it's giving an  extra 150G out of nowhere, but I highly doubt that this is the case. That mechanic would be absolutely awful for the game.

It does.

If Pyke and ADC kill someone were Pyke kills with his Ult the ADC and Pyke get Gold as if it was a solo kill.

Either way, it's still not 300 extra gold, unlike what OP stated, it's 150 extra gold.

While that's still a lot, it's not near as high. And it's **explicitly** for kills with his ultimate, not for every kill he gets.

However, it *will* be an extra 300 gold in instances where there's a second ally, such as in a gank. 150, instead of 75, for the jungler/ADC, and 300, instead of 75, for the other.
He didn't say it's 300 extra gold. He stated it's 300g for two damage dealers.
To be honest, that sounds like 300 each
Yeah, it is 300 each. Normally it's 300 for the person who got the kill and 150 for the assist. But with pyke it is 300 for both, which is 150 extra gold.
It was clearly specified that both Pyke and the previous damage dealer gets the privileges of the kill, including gold and assist, as if it was 2 different kills...

Killing Poppy with your ultimate gives you the kill gold, gives darius - if he participated in the kill - the kill gold AND the shutdown gold if there is any.

He doesn't have a lot of damage in his kit, though. He has this execute that essentially works as utility; plenty of champs would just cc in that situation to secure the kill. He just does it a little faster.

I do worry a little bit about the snowball elements, but honestly, he doesn't have the damage in his kit to function as a standalone assassin. And if he does, *that's* what will get nerfed.

This will help because one of the things I really hate is when an enemy gets away because as a support, I was too worried about taking the kill.  I've been in some toxic situations where I've accidentally taken a kill trying to cc or slow down an enemy for someone else only to have them berate me afterwards.  

It would be nice if Riot could figure out a way to roll that kind of ability into a support item(the kill gives kill gold to the assist too), but then again, it would just end up getting abused by other lanes like all support items have been in the past.
